revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_SelectSigilDown'''
(''no parameter'')
Jumps forward a number of frames based on the number of sigil pieces it represents. Basically the same as [[A_SelectSigilView]], but uses a different piece counter so that when a new piece is received the old sigil can be lowered. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Sigil}} and derived classes.
